reviewText: When I watched the 1st 15 minutes of the film I thought it was more of a Hentai film than a cartoon.  Then it went south and became more of a Saturday morning cartoon, poor animation and a story that was week.  To silly for an adult and too much nudity for a young person.
I thought there would be something interesting. Don't waste time over watching animation like this one. It would be better to watch Ninja Scroll.
